root.name: Pride GP Grand Prix 2003
root.description: Developed by Capcom and released in 2003 in Japan Pride GP Grand Prix 2003 featured nicely detailed character models, real life video entrances of the fighters, and a huge roster of fighters hailing from around the world. Roster Kazushi Sakuraba Quinton Jackson Fedor Emelianenko Hidehiko Yoshida Mirko Filipovic Mark Coleman Alistair Overeem Yoshihiro Takayama Kevin Randleman Wanderlei Silva Ricardo Arona Antonio Rodrigo Nogueira Heath Herring Kazuhiro Hamanaka Nino Schembri Rodrigo Gracie Shungo Oyama Dan Henderson Don Frye Ryan Gracie Anderson Silva Gary Goodridge Semmy Schilt Alexander Otsuka Igor Vovchanchyn Nobuhiko Takada Murilo Rua Akira Shoji Carlos Newton Daijiro MatsuiGame modesGrand PrixOne MatchOne Night TournamentPracticeCreate Fighter
